sentence.Network_en: Crystals having this property are said to be doubly refracting , or birefringent.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有这种性质的晶体叫做双折射晶体.

sentence.Network_en: Such substances are optically anisotropic and birefringent.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种材料是光学各向异性的,因而是双折射晶体.

sentence.Network_en: The stressmeter consists of a short solid or thick hollow cylinder of birefringent material.
sentence.Network_cn: 应力计由双折射材料制成的实心短圆柱体或厚壁空心短圆柱体构成.
